description: If you are hosting, this drink is perfect because it's easy to make and tastes great. You can also prepare this ahead of time if you want to have more free time on Christmas Eve!
name: Cranberry Bramble

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the ingredients except for the garnish in a shaker tin with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the ingredients except for the garnish in a shaker tin with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake vigorously and pour into a glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake vigorously and pour into a glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Add fresh ice and whole cranberries right on the ice or in a toothpick.
recipeInstructions.text: Add fresh ice and whole cranberries right on the ice or in a toothpick.
